snippet: Federal officials say the tunnel began in Tijuana, Mexico, ran for half a mile, and had rails and ventilation. It is one of many found in the fight against drug trafficking.
abstract: San Diego officials say tunnel discovered under Otay Mesa neighborhood leading across border with Mexico to Tijuana is longest one that has been found to date; six people are arrested and over ton of cocaine and seven tons of marijuana are confiscated; officials acknowledge they do not know how many such tunnels exist.
lead_paragraph: Federal officials say the tunnel began in Tijuana, Mexico, ran for half a mile, and had rails and ventilation. It is one of many found in the fight against drug trafficking.

headline.main: Drug-Smuggling Tunnel, Found in San Diego, Is Longest Yet
headline.print_headline: Tunnel Found  in San Diego From Mexico, With Elevator
